option.name: originalContent
option.value:
#%% import cv2 import os
video_path = '../sample/video/sample.avi' output_dir = '../sample/fig'
if not os.path.exists(output_dir): os.makedirs(output_dir)
cap = cv2.VideoCapture(video_path) frame_idx = 0 while cap.isOpened(): ret, frame = cap.read() if not ret: break frame_path = os.path.join(output_dir, f'frame_{frame_idx:05d}.jpg') cv2.imwrite(frame_path, frame) frame_idx += 1 cap.release() print(f"共保存 {frame_idx} 帧到 {output_dir}")

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
#%% import cv2 import os
video_path = '../sample/video/sample.avi' output_dir = '../sample/fig'
if not os.path.exists(output_dir): os.makedirs(output_dir)
cap = cv2.VideoCapture(video_path) frame_idx = 0 while cap.isOpened(): ret, frame = cap.read() if not ret: break frame_path = os.path.join(output_dir, f'frame_{frame_idx:05d}.jpg') cv2.imwrite(frame_path, frame) frame_idx += 1 cap.release() print(f"共保存 {frame_idx} 帧到 {output_dir}")
